title: Aarushi - Avirook Sen (mobi)

The murders that gripped the nation.

Seven years ago a teenage girl, Aarushi Talwar, was found murdered in her bedroom in Noida, a middle-class suburb of Delhi. But did they do it?

Avirook Sen attended the trial, accessed important documents and interviewed all the playersÃ¢â‚¬â€from AarushiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s friends to HemrajÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s old boss, from the investigators to the forensic scientistsÃ¢â‚¬â€to write a meticulous and chilling book that reads like a thriller but also tells a story that is horrifyingly true. Aarushi is the definitive account of a sensational crime, and the investigation and trial that followed
